attributes.action: Lower the age and implement lockdown for those over 60
attributes.additional_details: Many parents are in their 60’s and should still be considered as vulnerable amid this crisis. Health issues emerge for many individuals around their mid 50’s and onwards. It seems counterintuitive to not implement lockdown for these people, as they are the members of society who contribute to the economy, travel to work and have the responsibility to look after the household.
attributes.background: Implement lockdown in the UK for those 60 years and above

rejection.details:
Since this petition was started, the UK Government has told everyone of all ages to stay at home. You can find out more here: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others on the NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
